definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: The assembling process is complex for fitting way, but it has a high assembling accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 修配法裝配過程複雜，但裝配精度高。

sentences.english: The assembling process is complex for fitting way, but it has a high assembling accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 修配法裝配過程複雜，但裝配精度高。

sentences.english: Methods and steps of reading assembly drawings.
sentences.chinese: 看裝配圖的方法和步驟。

sentences.english: Thus parts sequences of subassemblies can be automatically planned.
sentences.chinese: 由此，完成子裝配體內零件的自動順序規劃。

sentences.english: To that end, Beijing Hyundai is fitting the new Elantra with fuel-saving silica tires.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到這點，現代公司將爲悅動裝配節省燃油的矽胎。

sentences.english: Place the new pump in position and tighten mounting bolts.
sentences.chinese: 使水泵就位，擰緊裝配螺栓。

sentences.english: The front defrosting duct assembly and the dashboard body are assembled together.
sentences.chinese: 前除霜風道總成和儀表板本體裝配在一起。

sentences.english: The main technical parameters of bearing and gear should be indicated in assembling drawings.
sentences.chinese: 軸承與齒輪的主要技術參數都要在裝配圖中標註出來。

sentences.english: A workbench is set up to assemble analog cameras in the Leica assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 在徠卡的裝配車間裏，安置着組裝類似相機的工作臺。

sentences.english: This occupation group covers Metal Fitters and Machinists not elsewhere classified.
sentences.chinese: 包括在其它地方未分類的金屬裝配工和機修工。

sentences.english: I’m looking for work as an electronics assembler.
sentences.chinese: 我想找做電器裝配工的工作。

sentences.english: The company ' s primary business is IC component packaging and test and memory module assembly.
sentences.chinese: 公司的主要業務是集成電路封裝測試和內存模塊裝配。

sentences.english: Several years of experience as an assembler or inspector in the same company are usually required.
sentences.chinese: 通常需要多年在同一家公司作爲裝配工或督察的經驗。

sentences.english: A new rig is finding myselfsteveryed in this well site.
sentences.chinese: 一套新鑽機正在這個井場裝配。

sentences.english: Figure 7 shows the sequence for tape bonding the chip and assembling the package.
sentences.chinese: 圖7所示爲帶狀引線連接芯片和管殼裝配的工藝程序。

sentences.english: Every telephone was installed a callback facility.
sentences.chinese: 每部電話都裝配有回叫設備。

definition: to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
